name: Among Us but it's 8-bit and Single Player
name_original: Among Us but it's 8-bit and Single Player
description: Welcome to the among us but it's 8-bit and single player fan game. I am not connected with innersloth or anything, this is just a fan game of their game Among Us.  This is only a map for now so just explore and wait for the next update! Credit to Arvie K for the single player idea. Go play his Among Us but Single Player Game: https://arvink005gmailcom.itch.io/among-us-but-single-player #strategy #other
